container.waystones.waystone_admin_selec: Select which waystone of <%s> you would like to visit:
gui.waystones.waystone_selection.hold_sh: Hold shift and click to delete
gui.waystones.waystone_selection.deletin: This will remove the waystone for everyone.
gui.waystones.waystone_selection.no_ways: You have not activated any waystones yet.
gui.waystones.inventory.no_waystones_act: You have not activated any waystones yet.
gui.waystones.inventory.confirm_return: Do you really want to warp back to this waystone?
chat.waystones.scroll_not_yet_bound: This scroll is not bound to a waystone.
chat.waystones.cannot_dimension_warp: You cannot warp between these worlds.
chat.waystones.waystone_missing: The waystone you tried to teleport to is currently being moved or has gone missing.
chat.waystones.cannot_transport_leashed: You cannot take leashed mobs with you
chat.waystones.cannot_transport_leashed_: You cannot take leashed mobs with you between worlds
chat.waystones.cannot_transport_this_lea: You cannot take this mob with you
chat.waystones.only_owner_can_edit: Waystones can only be renamed by whoever placed them.
chat.waystones.only_creative_can_edit: You have to be in creative mode to edit a global waystone.
chat.waystones.waystone_to_waystone_disa: You touch the waystone, but nothing happens.
chat.waystones.warp_plate_has_no_target: This warp plate is not bound to another warp plate yet.
chat.waystones.warp_plate_has_invalid_ta: The shard inside this warp plate has lost its attunement.
chat.waystones.not_enough_xp: You do not have enough experience to teleport.

commands.waystones.count: %s has %d waystones activated and owns %d of those
config.waystones.title: Waystones
config.waystones.general.restrictedWayst: List of waystone origins that should prevent others from editing. PLAYER is special in that it allows only edits by the owner of the waystone.
config.waystones.general.allowedVisibili: Add GLOBAL to allow every player to create global waystones.
config.waystones.general.warpStoneUseTim: The time in ticks that it takes to use a warp stone. This is the charge-up time when holding right-click.
config.waystones.general.scrollUseTime.t: The time in ticks it takes to use a scroll. This is the charge-up time when holding right-click.
config.waystones.general.warpPlateUseTim: The time in ticks that it takes to use a warp plate. This is the time the player has to stand on top for.
config.waystones.teleports.enableCosts.t: Set to false to simply disable all xp costs. See warpRequirements for more fine-grained control.
config.waystones.teleports.enableCooldow: Set to false to simply disable all cooldowns. See warpRequirements for more fine-grained control.
config.waystones.teleports.warpRequireme: List of warp requirements with comma-separated parameters in parentheses. Conditions can be defined as comma-separated list in square brackets. Will be applied in order.
config.waystones.teleports.transportPets: Set to ENABLED to have nearby pets teleport with you. Set to SAME_DIMENSION to have nearby pets teleport with you only if you're not changing dimensions. Set to DISABLED to disable.
config.waystones.teleports.transportLeas: Set to ENABLED to have leashed mobs teleport with you. Set to SAME_DIMENSION to have leashed mobs teleport with you only if you're not changing dimensions. Set to DISABLED to disable.
config.waystones.teleports.entityDenyLis: List of entities that cannot be teleported, either as pet, leashed, or on warp plates.
config.waystones.inventoryButton.invento: Set to 'NONE' for no inventory button. Set to 'NEAREST' for an inventory button that teleports to the nearest waystone. Set to 'ANY' for an inventory button that opens the waystone selection menu. Set to a waystone name for an inventory button that teleports to a specifically named waystone.
The x position of the inventory button in the inventory.
The y position of the inventory button in the inventory.
config.waystones.inventoryButton.creativ: Creative Mode Warp Button X Position
The x position of the inventory button in the creative menu.
Creative Mode Warp Button Y Position
The y position of the inventory button in the creative menu.
config.waystones.worldGen.wildWaystoneSt: Set to 'DEFAULT' to only generate the normally textured waystones. Set to 'MOSSY' or 'SANDY' to generate all as that variant. Set to 'BIOME' to make the style depend on the biome it is generated in.
config.waystones.worldGen.chunksBetweenW: Approximate chunk distance between wild waystones being generated. Set to 0 to disable generation.
config.waystones.worldGen.wildWaystonesD: List of dimensions that wild waystones are allowed to spawn in. If left empty, all dimensions except those in wildWaystonesDimensionDenyList are used.
List of dimensions that wild waystones are not allowed to spawn in. Only used if wildWaystonesDimensionAllowList is empty.
config.waystones.worldGen.nameGeneration: Set to 'PRESET_FIRST' to first use names from the nameGenerationPresets. Set to 'PRESET_ONLY' to use only those custom names. Set to 'MIXED' to have some waystones use custom names, and others random names.
The template to use when generating new names. Supported placeholders are {Biome} (english biome name) and {MrPork} (the default name generator).
These names will be used for the PRESET name generation mode. See the nameGenerationMode option for more info.
config.waystones.worldGen.spawnInVillage: Set to REGULAR to have waystones spawn in some villages. Set to FREQUENT to have waystones spawn in most villages. Set to DISABLED to disable waystone generation in villages. Waystones will only spawn in vanilla or supported villages.
If enabled, the text overlay on waystones will no longer always render at full brightness.
config.waystones.compatibility.journeyMa: If enabled, JourneyMap waypoints will be created for each activated waystone.
config.waystones.compatibility.preferJou: If enabled, JourneyMap waypoints will only be created if the mod 'JourneyMap Integration' is not installed.
config.waystones.compatibility.blueMap.t: If enabled, Waystones will add markers for waystones and sharestones to BlueMap.
config.waystones.compatibility.dynmap.to: If enabled, Waystones will add markers for waystones and sharestones to Dynmap.
